keywords.value: Late Show With David Letterman (TV Program)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: His farewell was much better than the usual mawkish TV send-off: He mixed favorite segments with classic skits and a few restrained fillips of sincerity and humility.

headline.print_headline: A Goodbye From Dave, Self-Mocking and Heartfelt
headline.main: Review: David Letterman Says Goodbye, With Self-Mockery and a Little Mush

snippet: His farewell was much better than the usual mawkish TV send-off: He mixed favorite segments with classic skits and a few restrained fillips of sincerity and humility.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley The TV Watch column holds David Letterman's last night hosting Late Show on CBS was refreshingly irreverent, standing in contrast to weepy, sentimental tone that has defined departures of other late night hosts.
